titles.title: James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005
James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005
James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005
James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005
James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005
James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005
A bill to provide for the expansion of the James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge, Honolulu County, Hawaii.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe under authority of the order of the Senate of 11/18/2005 with amendments. With written report No. 109-191.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 303.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans.
Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-429.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 237.

action.text: Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1165.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/2006--Public Law. James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge Expansion Act of 2005 - Expands the boundary of the James Campbell National Wildlife Refuge (Refuge) in Honolulu, Hawaii, to include approximately 1,100 acres of land. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) acquire such land; and (2) make minor modifications to the boundary of the Refuge to achieve U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service goals or to acquire property within the Refuge. Authorizes appropriations.
